Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-31584 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.0.0-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-31584 affecting package pytorch for versions less than 2.0.0-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package pytorch is earlier than 2.0.0-5, affected by CVE-2024-31584
